name: Hoppy Cart: A Frog And Puppy Kart Ride Game
name_original: Hoppy Cart: A Frog And Puppy Kart Ride Game
description:
DOWNLOAD IT TODAY FOR FREE - Hoppy Cart : A Frog And Puppy Kart Ride Game.
2 best friends out to travel the world and get rich in their own little mine cart. Help them hop over the hills, dodge mine 's, and collect as many coins as possible. Just tap the screen to jump or double jump, its that simple.

FEATURES
- Super cute dog and frog art.
- Save your top coin collected score.
- Great old school style graphics.
- Very simple jumpy game play.

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING
- "I love their flappy tongue in the wind, haha, ultra cute. nice and easy to play too. like it a lot." - animal lover - March 2 2014

- "its a relaxing experience i think. not too hard at all, and not frustrating. the music really helps. been enjoying this kart game with my daughter" - jack welch - Feb 2 2014


Show your support by rating Hoppy Cart : A Frog And Puppy Kart Ride Game.
